import { render } from "@testing-library/react"; import React,{ Component } from "react"; import homepic from '.././images/home.jpg'; class About extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { totalvote: 10} this.increaseVote = this.increaseVote.bind(this) } increaseVote(event){ if(this.state.totalvote > 0){ this.state.totalvote--; event.target.textContent = Number(event.target.textContent) + 1; } } render(){ return (
